Name: Dixon David
description:
Due to the problems in his country, Dixon, age 33, decided to start a store where he will sell general goods as well as pillows. He is a hard-working fighter who is optimistic and has a great desire to improve his family's lifestyle. This merchant is very happy with his hard work. He has the absolute support of his mother and sister.
He is seeking a loan from MiCredito on Kiva for the wholesale purchase of oil, soap, shampoo, beans, juice, and rice. With this, his business will be strengthened. Dixon wants to expand his store in the near future and stock more groceries.
